results.description: Manchester City held out for a draw with Atalanta in the Champions League after defender Kyle Walker had to go in goal for the closing stages of the match.
results.shortTitle: Drama in Milan as Man City held to draw
results.title: Atalanta 1-1 Manchester City: Defender Kyle Walker goes in goal in bizarre game in Milan

results.description: Napoli president Aurelio De Laurentiis says "buffoonery from the referee" led to coach Carlo Ancelotti and his assistant being sent off against Atalanta.
results.shortTitle: Ancelotti sent off after ref 'buffoonery'
results.title: Napoli 2-2 Atalanta: 'Buffoonery from referee led to Carlo Ancelotti being set off'

thumbnail.altText: Manager Carlo Ancelotti sent off for Napoli

results.description: Raheem Sterling scores an 11-minute hat-trick as Manchester City come from behind to thrash Atalanta in the Champions League.
results.shortTitle: Guardiola hails 'extraordinary' Sterling
results.title: Manchester City 5-1 Atalanta: Pep Guardiola praises 'extraordinary' Raheem Sterling after hat-trick

results.description: On-loan Manchester United defender Chris Smalling makes his Roma debut but is unable to prevent them from slipping to a 2-0 defeat at home to Atalanta.
results.shortTitle: Smalling makes debut as Roma lose
results.title: Roma 0-2 Atalanta: Chris Smalling makes his debut as Roma's unbeaten run ends

results.description: Holders Liverpool will face Napoli, Salzburg and Genk in the Champions League group stage, while Tottenham will meet Bayern Munich.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool face Napoli, Salzburg & Genk
results.title: Champions League draw: Liverpool drawn with Napoli, Tottenham to meet Bayern Munich

thumbnail.altText: Jurgen Klopp, Frank Lampard, Mauricio Pochettino, Pepe Guardiola

results.description: Former Liverpool defender Martin Skrtel joins Serie A side Atalanta on a free transfer.
results.shortTitle: Skrtel joins Serie A side Atalanta
results.title: Martin Skrtel: Atalanta sign former Liverpool defender

results.description: Atalanta qualify for the Champions League for the first time on a dramatic final day of the Serie A season.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta reach first Champions League
results.title: Serie A: Atalanta reach first Champions League after dramatic final day

thumbnail.altText: Atalanta players celebrate with coach Gian Piero Gasperini

results.description: Atalanta's Champions League qualification fate remains in their own hands going into their final fixture following their Serie A draw with Juventus.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta draw with Juve to boost hopes
results.title: Serie A: Atalanta draw with Juventus to keep alive Champions League qualification hopes

results.description: Atalanta manager Gian Piero Gasperini says the lack of a VAR decision in the Coppa Italia final was "a scandal."
results.shortTitle: No VAR decision a scandal - Gasperini
results.title: Atalanta 0-2 Lazio: Atalanta manager says Coppa Italia decision was "a scandal"

results.description: Atalanta boost their hopes of a Champions League place with victory at home to Genoa.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta win boosts Champions League bid
results.title: Atalanta 2-1 Genoa: Hosts boost Champions League hopes with narrow win

results.description: Atalanta move into Italy's final Champions League spot as late goals from Marten de Roon and Mario Pasalic gave them a 2-0 win over Udinese.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta move into Champions League spot
results.title: Atalanta 2-0 Udinese: Home side move into Serie A Champions League places

results.description: Atalanta will play Lazio in the Coppa Italia final after beating Fiorentina in their semi-final second leg.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta into first final in 23 years
results.title: Atalanta 2-1 Fiorentina (5-4 agg): Bergamo side into first final in 23 years

results.description: Atalanta break an unwanted record in a remarkable draw with Empoli as they fail to score with 47 shots.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta fail to score with 47 shots
results.title: Atalanta fail to score with 47 shots in 0-0 draw with Empoli

results.description: Fiorentina and Atalanta play out a six-goal thriller in the first leg of their Coppa Italia semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Fiorentina and Atalanta in cup thriller
results.title: Fiorentina 3-3 Atalanta: Coppa Italia semi-final first leg thriller

results.description: Atalanta are making waves in Serie A with their attacking play but it is the man they call 'The Wavebreaker' who is making the team tick.
results.shortTitle: 'The Wavebreaker' helping Serie A's top scorers
results.title: Marten de Roon: 'The Wavebreaker' helping Serie A's top scorers Atalanta

results.description: Holders Juventus are knocked out of the Coppa Italia, losing 3-0 to Atalanta in the quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta shock Juventus in Coppa Italia
results.title: Atalanta 3-0 Juventus: Holders Juve knocked out in quarter-finals of Coppa Italia

results.description: Barcelona overturn a first-leg deficit to win in the Copa del Rey, after Juventus are knocked out of the Coppa Italia by Atalanta.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona power through in Copa del Rey, Juve out of Coppa Italia
results.title: Barcelona thump Sevilla after Juventus knocked out by Atalanta

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores a late equaliser to rescue 10-man Juventus against Atalanta and maintain their unbeaten run in Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo rescues point for 10-man Juve
results.title: Atalanta 2-2 Juventus: Cristiano Ronaldo comes off bench to rescue point

results.description: Aston Villa sell goalkeeper goalkeeper Pierluigi Gollini to Atalanta after the Italian side exercises their option to buy him.
results.shortTitle: Goalkeeper Gollini leaves Aston Villa
results.title: Pierluigi Gollini: Aston Villa sell goalkeeper to Atalanta after loan spell

results.description: Michy Batshuayi says Atalanta fans have again racially abused him after Borussia Dortmund's Europa League elimination.
results.shortTitle: Batshuayi alleges further racist abuse
results.title: Michy Batshuayi: Chelsea striker alleges further racist abuse by Atalanta fans
